name: The Wheel To Go
description:
The following game contains ads, the game is an apk file for mobile.

After days of it delayed it is finally here

The Wheel To Go is a hardcore casual endless runner game with flappy bird inspired gameplay but with a few twist.

Help your wheel survive and collect points to unlock skins.

==================================

Originally the game was made in godot but when my files got corrupt (Which I didn't back up) I switched to gdevelop to get some stuff done faster and with added a few new gameplay mechanics

#arcade #platformer #survival #other #roguelike #mobilegame #APK
